Request an Appointment

Mental Health & Substance Abuse Treatment in Rocky Mount, NC

Behavioral health and recovery support for Rocky Mount, North Carolina.

Call Now Request an Appointment

Confidential care. No referral required.

We proudly serve individuals and families in Rocky Mount, NC with outpatient therapy, recovery services, and primary care support. Call to learn which services are the best fit for you.

Call Now Request an Appointment

People in Rocky Mount can connect with Stepping Stones for outpatient services and recovery support. We explain options clearly and help you take the next step.

Services often requested:

  • Clinical assessments
  • Outpatient treatment planning
  • Support for families and caregivers

Call to discuss scheduling and next steps.

What happens when you call

  1. We listen and answer immediate questions.
  2. We explain your options and next steps.
  3. If you choose, we schedule an appointment.

No referral required.

Ready to take the next step?

Call today or request an appointment. We’ll listen, answer your questions, and help you move forward.
